scripts.test: env SQLER_ODBC_VENDOR=mysql lab -v -P test -c --coverage-exclude lib -t 85 -e prod
scripts.test-mssql: env NODE_ENV=prod env SQLER_ODBC_VENDOR=mssql node test/lib/main.js crud
scripts.test-oracle: env NODE_ENV=prod env SQLER_ODBC_VENDOR=oracle node test/lib/main.js crud
scripts.test-mysql: env NODE_ENV=prod env SQLER_ODBC_VENDOR=mysql node test/lib/main.js crud
scripts.test-postgresql: env NODE_ENV=prod env SQLER_ODBC_VENDOR=postgresql node test/lib/main.js crud
